name: Regulation of Signalling Pathways
description: A variety of questions relating to signal transduction are investigated. How is calcium regulated in the cell and how does calcium regulate cell function? How are extracellular signals such as morphogens, growth factors or insulin, received and transmitted by intracellular proteins including kinases and phosphatases to control cellular proliferation and differentiation?

instructors: K Adeli S Angers L Attisano A Klip S Grinstein F Sicheri
